pullrequest.title: Tutorial for installing on ubuntu on windows (WSL)

content.raw: Sure I'll give it a spin and let you know. It does seem a little bit inefficient to install a Windows manager on top of Windows but happy to give feedback :). I have an old'ish PC (4 year old i7 CPU) but a new powerful graphics card. Gazebo runs smoothly on native Windows so it'll be interesting to see the WSL performance.
